summary: Manga list/browsing app with filter and sort controls.

existing_features.title: Add a new filter control in the manga list filter/controls panel: a checkmark/checkbox labeled "Complete only" that, when checked, restricts the displayed manga list to entries whose completion status is complete (i.e., the entry’s `completed` field is `true`). When unchecked, completed and non-completed entries are both shown.

Extend the existing "Sort By" selector to include two additional sort options: "Title (Z–A)" and "Rating (Low–High)". Ensure sorting behavior matches the selected option and continues to work with filtering and pagination.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a checkbox in the filter panel to show only manga with 'Complete' status when checked.
Add sorting options for Title (Z-A) and Rating (Low-High).

projectName: Add 'Complete' status filter checkbox and new sort options (Title Z–A, Rating Low–High)
